original: 「閣下認為蘇秦、張儀為辯士，殊不知蘇秦、張儀也是豪傑。蘇秦佩六國相印，張儀兩次相秦，皆有匡扶人國之謀略。」
text: "Your Excellency considers Su Qin and Zhang Yi to be debaters, but you don't know that Su Qin and Zhang Yi are also heroes. Su Qinpei is the seal of the six kingdoms, and Zhang Yi has a strategy to help the people and the country twice."
